name: Pit Fiend General
description: The Pit Fiend General is a towering, imposing fiend with a fierce presence. It has a formidable physique, glowing eyes, and appears clad in dark, intimidating armor.
memorable: Its aura induces fear, making adversaries falter before combat begins, while its powerful spells and multiple attacks wreak havoc on the battlefield.
goals: To dominate opponents through fear and overwhelming magical power.
relations: Often found leading other fiends or as a servant of a higher fiendish hierarchy.
environment: Commonly resides in infernal realms or areas of chaos and destruction.
strengths: High hit points and armor class, powerful melee attacks, significant spellcasting abilities.
weaknesses: Lower dexterity and intelligence compared to its exceptional strength and charisma; vulnerable to specific conditions.
attacks: Utilizes powerful melee attacks with its bite and mace, along with secondary claw and tail attacks.
most_powerful_ability: Circle of Fire creates a damaging area of flames that can incapacitate and severely harm foes.
senses: Possesses truesight up to 120 feet and a high passive perception score of 21, allowing it to sense hidden threats.
skills: Excels in athletics and insight, contributing to its effectiveness in both combat and perception.
additional_information: Immunities to fire and poison damage
Can cast fireball spell at will
Fear Aura that frightens enemies within 20 feet
Innate spellcasting ability based on Wisdom
Multiattack option using bite and mace simultaneously
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting allowing it to cast spells like detect magic and fireball at will, and hold monster and sending three times per day.
test_queries: huge fiend with devastating magic attacks
aura that frightens enemies in battle
pit fiend with strong melee and spellcasting
